overview:
Gillian Muessig is the founding president of SEOmoz, the world’s largest and best known providers of marketing campaign management and analytics software. SEOmoz.org serves a community of half a million search marketers around the world; the SEOmoz blog is read by 100,000+ SEOs each month.

Known as SEOmom throughout the industry, Gillian is a thought leader with her finger on the pulse of the international tech startup landscape. She has provided keynotes and sessions for conferences in North and South America, Asia, Australia, Europe, Scandinavia and the UK.

Gillian’s radio program, CEO Coach has a global listenership of several thousand entrepreneurs and airs Mondays at 10AM PST on WebmasterRadio.fm, covering entrepreneurial issues from funding and finance to staffing, marketing, pricing models, and brand development. She serves on Boards of Directors and Advisers for companies in four continents.
